# coder state push


Push a Terraform state file to a workspace.

## Usage
```console
coder state push <workspace> <file> [flags]
```


## Local Flags
| Name |  Default | Usage | Environment | 
| ---- |  ------- | ----- | -------- |
| --build, -b |0 |<code>Specify a workspace build to target by name.</code> | |
